name: Pixel Painters
description:
Pixel Painters is a simple game about flying around in a room and painting pixels on any of the room's six surfaces.

That's it, really. Oh! There is also multiplayer, so that you can draw together with friends or with strangers!

The game is available to download, and is also available to be played on the browser at: https://www.zerobyter.net/game/pixelpainters
